alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Ellis; Johnson; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 10:32PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Johnson, eastern Tarrant, northwestern Ellis and western Dallas Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1031 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pantego, or near Arlington, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Fort Worth, Arlington, Irving, Grand Prairie, Carrollton, Mansfield, Euless, Desoto, Bedford, Grapevine, Cedar Hill, Haltom City, Coppell, Duncanville, Hurst, Burleson, Lancaster, Waxahachie, and Farmers Branch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
